title: Pseudospin-driven spin relaxation mechanism in graphene
title_cn: 伪纺丝驱动的石墨烯自旋弛豫机理
abstract: The prospect of transporting spin information over long distances in graphene, possible because of its small intrinsic spin–orbit coupling (SOC) and vanishing hyperfine interaction, has stimulated intense research exploring spintronics applications. However, measured spin relaxation times are orders of magnitude smaller than initially predicted, while the main physical process for spin dephasing and its charge-density and disorder dependences remain unconvincingly described by conventional mechanisms. Here, we unravel a spin relaxation mechanism for non-magnetic samples that follows from an entanglement between spin and pseudospin driven by random SOC, unique to graphene. The mixing between spin and pseudospin-related Berry’s phases results in fast spin dephasing even when approaching the ballistic limit, with increasing relaxation times away from the Dirac point, as observed experimentally. The SOC can be caused by adatoms, ripples or even the substrate, suggesting novel spin manipulation strategies based on the pseudospin degree of freedom.
abstract_cn: 由于其固有的自旋轨道耦合（SOC）小和超精细相互作用消失，可能在石墨烯中长距离传输自旋信息的前景激发了探索自旋电子学应用的广泛研究。但是，测得的自旋弛豫时间比最初预测的要小几个数量级，而自旋移相的主要物理过程及其电荷密度和无序性依旧无法通过常规机制令人信服地描述。在这里，我们解开了非磁性样品的自旋弛豫机制，该机制是由石墨烯特有的随机SOC驱动的自旋与伪自旋之间的纠缠引起的。实验观察到，即使在接近弹道极限时，自旋和伪自旋相关的Berry相之间的混合也会导致快速自旋移相，并且远离Dirac点的弛豫时间增加。 SOC可能是由原子，波纹甚至基材引起的，这表明基于伪自旋自由度的新型自旋操纵策略。

title: Observation of self-amplifying Hawking radiation in an analogue black-hole laser
title_cn: 模拟黑洞激光器中自放大霍金辐射的观察
abstract: By a combination of quantum field theory and general relativity, black holes have been predicted to emit Hawking radiation. Observation from an actual black hole is, however, probably extremely difficult, so attention has turned to analogue systems in the search for such radiation. Here, we create a narrow, low density, very low temperature atomic Bose–Einstein condensate, containing an analogue black-hole horizon and an inner horizon, as in a charged black hole. We report the observation of Hawking radiation emitted by this black-hole analogue, which is the output of the black-hole laser formed between the horizons. We also observe the exponential growth of a standing wave between the horizons, which results from interference between the negative-energy partners of the Hawking radiation and the negative-energy particles reflected from the inner horizon. We thus observe self-amplifying Hawking radiation.
abstract_cn: 结合量子场论和广义相对论，已经预测黑洞会发射霍金辐射。 然而，从实际的黑洞观察可能非常困难，因此在寻找这种辐射时，注意力已转向模拟系统。 在这里，我们创建了一个狭窄，低密度，极低温的Bose爱因斯坦冷凝物，其中包含一个带电黑洞的模拟黑洞视界和一个内部视界。 我们报告了这种黑洞类似物发出的霍金辐射的观察结果，这是在视界之间形成的黑洞激光的输出。 我们还观察到了地平线之间驻波的指数增长，这是由霍金辐射的负能量伙伴与内部地平线反射的负能量粒子之间的干扰导致的。 因此，我们观察到了自放大的霍金辐射。

title: Ultrafast plasmonic nanowire lasers near the surface plasmon frequency
title_cn: 表面等离子体激元频率附近的超快等离子体纳米线激光器
abstract: Light–matter interactions are inherently slow as the wavelengths of optical and electronic states differ greatly. Surface plasmon polaritons — electromagnetic excitations at metal–dielectric interfaces — have generated significant interest because their spatial scale is decoupled from the vacuum wavelength, promising accelerated light–matter interactions. Although recent reports suggest the possibility of accelerated dynamics in surface plasmon lasers, this remains to be verified. Here, we report the observation of pulses shorter than 800 fs from hybrid plasmonic zinc oxide (ZnO) nanowire lasers. Operating at room temperature, ZnO excitons lie near the surface plasmon frequency in such silver-based plasmonic lasers, leading to accelerated spontaneous recombination, gain switching and gain recovery compared with conventional ZnO nanowire lasers. Surprisingly, the laser dynamics can be as fast as gain thermalization in ZnO, which precludes lasing in the thinnest nanowires (diameter less than 120 nm). The capability to combine surface plasmon localization with ultrafast amplification provides the means for generating extremely intense optical fields, with applications in sensing, nonlinear optical switching, as well as in the physics of strong-field phenomena.
abstract_cn: 由于光学和电子态的波长差异很大，因此光与物质的相互作用固有地很慢。表面等离激元极化子＆＃8212;金属介电界面处的电磁激发由于它们的空间尺度与真空波长解耦，因此有望加速光与物质的相互作用，因此引起了极大的兴趣。尽管最近的报道表明在表面等离激元激光器中加速动力学的可能性，但这仍有待验证。在这里，我们报告了来自混合等离激元氧化锌（ZnO）纳米线激光器的短于800 fs的脉冲的观察结果。 ZnO激子在室温下运行，在这种基于银的等离子体激元激光器中位于表面等离子体激元频率附近，与传统的ZnO纳米线激光器相比，导致加速的自发重组，增益转换和增益恢复。出人意料的是，激光动力学可以与ZnO中的增益热化一样快，这可以防止在最细的纳米线（直径小于120 nm）中产生激光。将表面等离子体激元定位与超快放大相结合的能力提供了一种产生极强光场的方法，并应用于传感，非线性光开关以及强场现象的物理学中。

title: Exotic circuit elements from zero-modes in hybrid superconductor–quantum-Hall systems
title_cn: 混合超导体-量子-霍尔系统中零模式的奇异电路元件
abstract: The fractional quantum Hall effect and superconductivity, remarkable phenomena in their own right, can harbour even more exotic physics at their interface. In particular, coupling quantum Hall edges with a superconductor can create emergent excitations known as non-Abelian anyons that trap widely coveted Majorana fermion zero-modes and generalizations thereof. We uncover non-local transport signatures of these zero-modes that not only provide striking experimental signatures of the anyons, but moreover allow one to construct novel circuit elements, including superconducting current and voltage mirrors, fractional charge transistors and flux-based capacitors. Underlying this unusual transport is a phenomenon that we term ‘perfect Andreev conversion’—whereby quasiparticles propagating chirally at the edge reverse their electric charge as a result of hybridization with the zero-modes. Our findings suggest numerous experimental directions in the study of quantum-Hall–superconductor systems hybrids and highlight a fundamentally new application of non-Abelian anyons.
abstract_cn: 分数量子霍尔效应和超导性本身就是引人注目的现象，它们的界面处甚至可以包含更多奇异的物理学。尤其是，将量子霍尔边缘与超导体耦合可以产生称为非阿贝伦任意子的涌现激发，从而捕获广受垂涎的马里亚纳费米子零模及其广义化。我们发现了这些零模式的非本地传输签名，这些签名不仅提供了惊人的实验性签名，而且还允许人们构造新颖的电路元件，包括超导电流和电压镜，分数电荷晶体管和基于通量的电容器。这种异常传输的基础是一种现象，我们称其为“完美的安德列夫转换”，其中由于与零模杂交的结果，在边缘手性传播的拟粒子使它们的电荷反转。我们的发现为量子霍尔超导体系统混合体的研究提供了许多实验方向，并突出了非阿贝尔正电子在根本上的新应用。

title: Asymmetry of collective excitations in electron- and hole-doped cuprate superconductors
title_cn: 电子和空穴掺杂的铜酸盐超导体中集体激发的不对称性
abstract: High-temperature superconductivity emerges on doping holes or electrons into antiferromagnetic copper oxides. The large energy scale of magnetic excitations, for example, compared with phonon energies, is thought to drive superconductivity with high transition temperatures (Tc). Comparing high-energy magnetic excitations of hole- and electron-doped superconductors provides an opportunity to test this hypothesis. Here, we use resonant inelastic X-ray scattering at the Cu L3-edge to reveal collective excitations in the electron-doped cuprate Nd2−xCexCuO4. Surprisingly, magnetic excitations harden significantly across the antiferromagnetic high-temperature superconductivity phase boundary despite short-ranged antiferromagnetic correlations, in contrast to the hole-doped cuprates. Furthermore, we find an unexpected branch of collective modes in superconducting compounds, absent in hole-doped cuprates. These modes emanate from the zone centre and possess a higher temperature scale than Tc, signalling a distinct quantum phase. Despite their differences, the persistence of magnetic excitations and the existence of a distinct quantum phase are apparently universal in both hole- and electron-doped cuprates.
abstract_cn: 高温超导现象出现在掺杂空穴或电子上形成反铁磁性铜氧化物。例如，与声子能量相比，磁激发的大能量尺度被认为可以在高转变温度（T c ）下驱动超导性。比较空穴和电子掺杂的超导体的高能磁激发提供了检验该假设的机会。在这里，我们使用Cu L 3 边缘的共振非弹性X射线散射来揭示电子掺杂的铜酸盐Nd 2＆＃8722; x Ce x CuO 4 。出乎意料的是，尽管是短距离的反铁磁相关性，但与空穴掺杂的铜酸盐相反，磁激发在反铁磁高温超导相边界上显着硬化。此外，我们在超导化合物中发现了一个出乎意料的集体模式分支，而在掺杂空穴的铜酸盐中却没有。这些模式从区域中心散发出来，并具有比T c 高的温度标度，表示不同的量子相。尽管存在差异，但在空穴和电子掺杂的铜酸盐中，磁激发的持久性和明显的量子相的存在显然是普遍的。
